newsNotes: After over a year of development and some hickups, the developer preview of Drosera Launcher has gone live! In this preview, we are just taking a tour of Drosera Launcher. I expect things to be broken, I expect things to not work or to be slow, so bear with me. I want your initial feedback on the launcher itself and this information can be submitted in the Patreon or Telegram Group. Thankyou for your support!
